review: I don't like the layout of the screen interface....very confusing and difficult to navigate if you want to go to something other than Amazon.If you just like the Amazon Prime then this will be fine for you.Also, having difficulty with connection issues which I never had with Roku.
author: Brad G.

review: Convenient and easy to use. I don't have cable but have an amazon prime and nextflix account, and this makes it easy for me to watch shows and movies from my TV.  It runs pretty smoothly and I haven't had any trouble with shows freezing or slow speeds while I'm watching. There's also lots of  channels you can upload directly from the Amazon website. The price is also pretty good and comparable/cheaper to other options such as the Roku.
author: Lena

review: Great product, with one down side the wifi signal gets lost and the only way to correct it is to reboot the device.  This was my second fire stick tv the first one was perfect no wifi issues over all I would recommend this product.
